executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Generate comprehensive backend API tests with three components:

1. API-LEVEL TESTS (50 test cases):
   - POST /api/game/join: 10 tests (valid join, race conditions, error cases)
   - POST /api/game/tick: 10 tests (countdown, number calling, state transitions)
   - POST /api/game/complete: 10 tests (win/loss, XP awards, rank progression)
   - GET /api/leaderboard: 10 tests (rankings, pagination, user position)
   - POST /api/leaderboard (admin): 10 tests (reset, recalculate, auth)

2. LOAD TESTING (concurrent operations):
   - 100 concurrent players joining games
   - 50 simultaneous game ticks
   - 200 concurrent leaderboard requests
   - Measure response times, throughput, and error rates
   - Generate performance metrics

3. COVERAGE REPORT:
   - Statement coverage
   - Branch coverage
   - Function coverage
   - Line coverage
   - Identify untested code paths

Output format: Jest/Vitest tests with coverage reporting. Generate detailed metrics for performance SLAs.
